A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Despite some pacing issues\, the Last Jedi is one of the best Star Wars in regards to cinematography\, editing\, sound mixing and visual effects. It also has\, hands down\, the best fight scene in a Star Wars movie to date. Excellent performances from Mark Hamill\, Daisy Ridley and Adam Driver make the movie that much better. I thoroughly enjoyed it and recommend it to anyone who loves Star Wars.
